text: Vittoria Francesca Maria Bogo Deledda (1 January 1967 â€“ 17 March 2020) was an Italian politician. She was a member of the Five Star Movement party. She served as a Senator from March 2018 until her death. She was born in Posada, Sardinia. Bogo Deledda died of cancer on 17 March 2020 in Budoni. She was 53. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Sardinia
title: Vittoria Bogo Deledda
